group.pals.android.lib.ui.filechooser.services
Class LocalFileProvider

java.lang.Object
  Service
      group.pals.android.lib.ui.filechooser.services.FileProviderService
          group.pals.android.lib.ui.filechooser.services.LocalFileProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFileProvider
public class LocalFileProvider
extends FileProviderService

This is simple local file provider - as its name means.
It handles file request on local device.

Since:
v2.1 alpha
Author:
Hai Bison

listFiles

public IFile[] listFiles(IFile dir,
                         boolean[] hasMoreFiles)
                  throws Exception
Description copied from interface: IFileProvider
Lists files inside dir, the result should be sorted with IFileProvider.SortType and IFileProvider.SortOrder

Parameters:
dir - the root directory which needs to list files
hasMoreFiles - since Java does not allow variable parameters, so we use this trick. To use this parameter, set its size to 1. If the dir has more files than max file count allowed, the element returns true, otherwise it is false
Returns:
an array of files, or null if an exception occurs.
Throws:
Exception

                         throws Exception

Lists files inside dir, the result should be sorted with IFileProvider.SortType and IFileProvider.SortOrder

Parameters:
dir - the root directory which needs to list files
hasMoreFiles - since Java does not allow variable parameters, so we use this trick. To use this parameter, set its size to 1. If the dir has more files than max file count allowed, the element returns true, otherwise it is false
Returns:
an array of files, or null if an exception occurs.
Throws:

Lists all files inside dir, no filter.

Parameters:

listAllFiles

public List<IFile> listAllFiles(IFile dir,
                                IFileFilter filter)
Description copied from interface: IFileProvider
Gets a list of the files in the directory represented by dir. This list is then filtered through a IFileFilter and matching files are returned as a list of files. Returns null if dir is not a directory. If filter is null then all files match.

Parameters:
dir - an IFile
filter - the filter to match names against, may be null.
Returns:
a list of files or null.

accept

public boolean accept(IFile pathname)
Description copied from interface: IFileProvider
Filters pathname based on this file provider configurations.

Parameters:
pathname - IFile
Returns:
true if pathname passed all filter configurations, false otherwise
